thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com | 3 of 95
thread.title: Alex Shaw
thread.title_full: TShirt Studio reviewed by Alex Shaw

author: Alex Shaw
title: Alex Shaw
text:
Cannot complain, I had ordered my customer t-shirt 7 days ago. After 6 days nothing had arrived (due to TSS being super busy), which is absolutely fair enough. After speaking to customer services, the lovely lady on the phone upgraded my order to express and it arrive 23hs later.
Thank you ever so much.
P.s. The quality of the basic t shirt and print is 10 out of 10!
